thread.title: Bell Techlogix Manager Appointed to the Virginia Board of Conservation and Recreation
thread.title_full: Bell Techlogix Manager Appointed to the Virginia Board of Conservation and Recreation - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Bell Techlogix Manager Appointed to the Virginia Board of Conservation and Recreation
text:
Bell Techlogix
RICHMOND, Va. , Sept. 21, Bell Techlogix , the leading IT managed services and solutions company, today announced that Dexter C. Hurt , Senior Project Manager, has been appointed by Virginia Governor Terry McAuliffe to the state's Board of Conservation and Recreation.
The Virginia Board of Conversation and Recreation is comprised of 12 governor-appointed members and maintains a wide range of responsibilities, including reviewing requests for grants or loans pertaining to outdoor recreation and trail development, advising the Department of Conservation & Recreation's director on State Park master plans and substantial amendments, and reviewing designations proposed for scenic rivers, highways and Virginia byways, among other duties.
"I am excited and honored for the opportunity to serve the State of Virginia on the Board of Conservation and Recreation," Dexter says. " Virginia has many natural resources, from its state parks and beaches to its hiking, biking and horse trails. My family and I are outdoor enthusiasts, camping several times during the summers, fishing year-round and enjoying the state parks and beaches on a regular basis."
"Dexter's approach to work is more than doing the job effectively and efficiently. He performs with complete dedication and commitment. The Virginia Board of Conversation and Recreation can expect nothing less from Dexter in this appointment of service," said Scott Allen , Vice President Enterprise Services.
Based in Richmond, Virginia , Dexter operates out of Bell Techlogix LogixCenter2. For the last 18 years, Dexter has serviced a diverse range of customers on behalf of Bell Techlogix, first in his role as a Senior Systems Engineer & Project Manager and, for the last nine years, as a Senior Project Manager. To learn more, please visit www.belltechlogix.com .
About Bell Techlogix:
Bell Techlogix is a leading information technology managed services and solutions company focused on global and mid-market enterprises as well as educational institutions.
Bell Techlogix provides our services and solutions to a variety of customers, leveraging BEAM, our integrated enterprise service delivery platform, across our offerings portfolio, including End User Computing, Infrastructure Management, BEAM Cloud Services, IT Lifecycle Services and Enterprise Mobility Management. Bell Techlogix has leveraged over 30 years of experience to build market leading solutions such as our Service Desk 3.0 offering, BEAM service delivery and cloud management platform and Cyber Security capabilities for comprehensive IT managed services.
Bell Techlogix is a privately held company headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana . For more information on Bell Techlogix, please visit us on the web at www.belltechlogix.com , follow us on Twitter @BellTechlogixHQ , like us on LinkedIn or become a fan on our Facebook page .
